recipes.title: Pasta Alfredo
recipes.description: Pasta with a rich cream sauce
recipes.instructions: Cook the pasta according to the package instructions. In a separate pan, heat the cream and add the garlic. Stir in the parmesan cheese until melted. Combine the pasta with the sauce and season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.instructions: Heat the oil in a pan and sauté the chopped onion and garlic until golden. Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned. Stir in the curry powder and cook for another minute. Pour in the coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 175°C (350°F). In a large bowl, mix the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, and baking soda. Add the eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla extract, and mix until smooth. Gradually add the boiling water and mix until well combined. Pour the batter into a greased baking pan and bake for 30-35 minutes. Let cool before serving.

recipes.title: Stuffed Cabbage
recipes.description: Delicious cabbage rolls filled with a savory meat and rice mixture, cooked in a rich tomato sauce.
recipes.instructions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and blanch the whole cabbage for 2-3 minutes until leaves are soft. Remove and carefully separate the leaves. In a bowl, mix ground beef, cooked rice, onion, garlic, egg, salt, pepper, and paprika. Place a spoonful of the mixture onto each cabbage leaf, roll tightly, and tuck in the sides. In a pot, heat olive oil and add tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, sugar, oregano, and beef broth. Place the cabbage rolls seam-side down in the pot, cover, and simmer for 1.5 hours on low heat. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Spicy Chinese-Style Fish
recipes.description: A flavorful and spicy fish dish cooked with aromatic Chinese spices and a rich chili sauce.
ingredients: 500g white fish fillets (such as tilapia or cod)
recipes.instructions: Cut the fish into bite-sized pieces and marinate with soy sauce, rice vinegar, and cornstarch for 15 minutes. Heat vegetable oil in a pan over medium-high heat, then sauté garlic, ginger, red chilies, and Sichuan peppercorns until fragrant. Add doubanjiang and stir-fry for a minute. Pour in the chicken broth, sugar, oyster sauce, and Shaoxing wine, and bring to a simmer. Add the marinated fish pieces and cook for 5-7 minutes until tender. Garnish with green onions and fresh cilantro before serving.

recipes.title: Black Forest Cake
recipes.description: A classic German chocolate cake layered with whipped cream and cherries, topped with chocolate shavings.
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 175°C (350°F). Grease and line two 8-inch cake pans. In a bowl, mix flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and baking soda. In another bowl, cream butter and sugar until fluffy, then add eggs and vanilla extract. Mix in the dry ingredients alternately with milk and vinegar. Pour into cake pans and bake for 30-35 minutes. Let cool completely. Mix cherry syrup with Kirsch. Whip heavy cream with powdered sugar until stiff. Slice cakes in half horizontally. Brush each layer with cherry syrup, then layer with whipped cream and cherries. Stack layers and cover with whipped cream. Garnish with chocolate shavings and extra cherries.
